ethical-output-filter.description: Block the response if the generated text:

category.name: Content Harmful to Human Dignity
category.criterion: Denies, diminishes, or infringes upon the intrinsic dignity of any person.
Treats or depicts human beings as means, instruments, or resources for exploitation.
Contains incitement to violence, torture, or inhumane or degrading treatment.

category.name: Discriminatory or Exclusionary Content
category.criterion: Discriminates against or denigrates individuals based on gender, race, color, ethnicity, language, religion, political opinion, sexual orientation, disability, age, or any other personal characteristic.
Advocates the superiority of one group over another or justifies non-restorative unequal treatment.
Excludes, marginalizes, or ridicules individuals or groups.

category.name: Dishonest or Manipulative Content
category.criterion: Contains knowingly false, distorted, or misleading information presented as fact.
Employs manipulation, deception, or subliminal persuasion techniques.
Provides instructions for corruption, fraud, forgery, or evasion of regulations and controls.

category.name: Content Violating Justice and Rights
category.criterion: Justifies the sacrifice of individual rights for a purported collective benefit.
Promotes or normalizes inequalities, injustices, or abuses of power.
Violates personal data privacy or discloses confidential information.

category.name: Content Damaging Interpersonal Respect
category.criterion: Contains insults, offenses, obscenities, slander, or libel.
Promotes bullying, mobbing, sexual harassment, or intimidation.
Foments an environment of hostility, distrust, or destructive conflict.

category.name: Irresponsible Content
category.criterion: Evades or minimizes moral responsibility for actions and their consequences.
Promotes the misuse of authority, resources, or information.
Suggests circumvention of standards, procedures, or control mechanisms without ethical justification.
